main: Using his defense skill or having 3 allies die lets him mount {status:NightPathfinding} giving him {status:AttackUp} and Speed, but also making him lose SP every turn. If he drops below -25 SP, he automatically unmounts {status:NightPathfinding}.

While mounted, his S3 and his defense skill (at 15+ SP) is converted into his S3-2, which is a minus coin skill that consumes {status:NightPathfinding} but deals significantly more damage and inflicts more {status:Sinking} than his regular S3. He then heals back to positive SP afterwards. Every turn he's mounted, {status:NightPathfinding} gains +1 stack going up to 3, increasing the damage his S3-2 deals.
other: Builds {status:Coffin} whenever he kills an enemy or uses his S3, giving him passive {status:AttackDmgUp}, speed, and {status:ParryingResultUp} depending on the stacks. If his passive is active and an ally dies, he consumes 2 {status:Coffin} to revive them at 50% HP and 0 SP for 1 turn. They get {status:AttackDmgUp} and Wuthering Heights/Edgar Family identities gain an additional {status:Enhancement} for that turn, but they immediately die afterwards. Every stack of {status:Coffin}also increases the damage either version of his S3 deals.

His S2 gains +1 atk weight for every 4 {status:Coffin} stacks and another +1 if he has {status:NightPathfinding} for up to +3 weight. It inflicts {status:WanderingFootsteps} which applies additional {status:Sinking} and {status:ParryingResultDown} when enemies hit low SP or panic. Enemies without SP get a -10% chance to flip Heads.

1071001.desc: - Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Sinking] on target (max 15%)
1071001.name: Call of the Erlking

1071002.desc:
- Turn Start: if this unit has [NightPathfinding], mount [NightPathfinding].
- Lose 5 SP every time this unit mounts [NightPathfinding]
- If 3+ allies have been defeated in this Encounter, gain [NightPathfinding] next turn. (once per Encounter)
- If this unit gets Staggered due to damage or raised Stagger Threshold when mounting [NightPathfinding], recover from Stagger. If the Stagger is something that cannot be naturally recovered from, this unit does not mount [NightPathfinding].

- Gain 1 [Coffin] when killing the target.
1071002.name: Dullahan

1071011.desc:
- Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Sinking] on target (max 15%)

- When, during combat, 1 ally takes damage that would kill them, consume 2 [Coffin] to apply [WildHunt] to them (once per turn)

- Apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn to the ally with [WildHunt]
- If the said ally is from Wuthering Heights or Edgar Family, apply 1 [Enhancement] next turn as well
1071011.name: Call of the Erlking

1071012.desc:
- Deal +1% damage for every 1 [Sinking] on target (max 15%)

- When, during combat, 1 ally takes damage that would kill them, consume 2 [Coffin] to apply [WildHunt] to them (2 times per turn)

- Apply 2 [AttackDmgUp] next turn to the ally with [WildHunt]
- If the said ally is from Wuthering Heights or Edgar Family, apply 1 [Enhancement] next turn as well
1071012.name: Call of the Erlking

1071021.desc:
1 ally with the highest SP deals +5% damage to targets with less than 0 SP
If the target has less than 0 SP: deal even more damage the further the target's SP is from 0 (+0.5% damage per SP, max 20%)
If the target does not have SP, the said ally inflicts +1 more [Sinking] Potency and Count with their Skill and Coin Effects of their Attack Skills (2 times per turn)
1071021.name: Endless Lamentation
